raw_comment:
I wonder what conditions these countries are in? Why didn't they ask 25-39yr/o their opinion? did they ask all people groups in each country?

I notice in most countries the vast majority of 15-24 have a more optimistic outlook on the growth throughout the years

Title: Is Genz's Activisim Making The World A Better Place?
ace_sentences: I wonder what conditions these countries are in.
The survey did not ask the opinion of people who are 25-39 years old.
I wonder why the survey did not ask the opinion of people who are 25-39 years old.
I wonder whether the survey asked all age groups in each country.
In most countries, the vast majority of people who are 15-24 years old have a more optimistic outlook on growth throughout the years.
The title is: Is Gen Z's activism making the world a better place?
